Name: Magic Tavern
About the game: Magic Tavern - A Virtual Reality Shooting Gallery 'You dare to scare the peasants with your cheap illusions? Prove that you are a real wizard!', said the mage. Do you accept his challenge? This game is for HTC VIVE only! You can play this game seated or standing.
